# Social and Enterprise SSO (OAuth 2.0 / SAML) login with SuperTokens

## Features

- Sign-up / Sign-in with OAuth 2.0 (Like google, facebook, active directory, etc..) and SAML providers <br/>
- Secure session management <br/>
- Email verification <br/>
- Multi-tenancy
